plugin.name: Maven Site Plugin 3
plugin.description: The Maven Site Plugin is a plugin that generates a site for the current project.

mojo.description:
Deploys the generated site to a local staging or mock directory based on the site URL specified in the <distributionManagement> section of the POM.

It can be used to test that links between module sites in a multi-module build work.

parameter.name: chmod
parameter.description: Whether to run the "chmod" command on the remote site after the deploy. Defaults to "true".

parameter.name: chmodMode
parameter.description: The mode used by the "chmod" command. Only used if chmod = true. Defaults to "g+w,a+rX".

parameter.name: chmodOptions
parameter.description: The options used by the "chmod" command. Only used if chmod = true. Defaults to "-Rf".

parameter.name: inputDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the generated project sites and report distributions.

parameter.name: inputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the input encoding.

parameter.name: localRepository
parameter.description: The local repository.

parameter.name: locales
parameter.description: A comma separated list of locales supported by Maven. The first valid token will be the default Locale for this instance of the Java Virtual Machine.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the output encoding.

parameter.name: reactorProjects
parameter.description: The reactor projects.

parameter.name: siteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the site.xml file and the source for apt, fml and xdoc docs.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Set this to 'true' to skip site generation and staging.

parameter.name: skipDeploy
parameter.description: Set this to 'true' to skip site deployment.

parameter.name: stagingDirectory
parameter.description: Staging directory location. This needs to be an absolute path, like C:\stagingArea\myProject\ on Windows or /stagingArea/myProject/ on Unix. If this is not specified, the site will be staged in ${project.build.directory}/staging.

parameter.name: topSiteURL
parameter.description: Top distribution management site url, for manual configuration when auto-calculated value doesn't match expectations. Relative module directory will be calculated from this url.

mojo.description:
Adds the site descriptor (site.xml) to the list of files to be installed/deployed.
For Maven-2.x this is enabled by default only when the project has pom packaging since it will be used by modules inheriting, but this can be enabled for other projects packaging if needed.
This default execution has been removed from the built-in lifecycle of Maven 3.x for pom-projects. Users that actually use those projects to provide a common site descriptor for sub modules will need to explicitly define this goal execution to restore the intended behavior.

parameter.name: inputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the input encoding.

parameter.name: localRepository
parameter.description: The local repository.

parameter.name: locales
parameter.description: A comma separated list of locales supported by Maven. The first valid token will be the default Locale for this instance of the Java Virtual Machine.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the output encoding.

parameter.name: reactorProjects
parameter.description: The reactor projects.

parameter.name: siteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the site.xml file and the source for apt, fml and xdoc docs.

mojo.description: Displays the effective site descriptor as an XML for this build, after inheritance and interpolation of site.xml.

parameter.name: attributes
parameter.description: Additional template properties for rendering the site. See Doxia Site Renderer.

parameter.name: generateProjectInfo
parameter.description: Whether to generate the summary page for project reports: project-info.html.

parameter.name: generatedSiteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing generated documentation. This is used to pick up other source docs that might have been generated at build time.

parameter.name: inputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the input encoding.

parameter.name: localRepository
parameter.description: The local repository.

parameter.name: locales
parameter.description: A comma separated list of locales supported by Maven. The first valid token will be the default Locale for this instance of the Java Virtual Machine.

parameter.name: moduleExcludes
output
parameter.description:
Optional parameter to write the output of this help in a given file, instead of writing to the console.
Note: Could be a relative path.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the output encoding.

parameter.name: reactorProjects
parameter.description: The reactor projects.

parameter.name: relativizeDecorationLinks
parameter.description: Make links in the site descriptor relative to the project URL. By default, any absolute links that appear in the site descriptor, e.g. banner hrefs, breadcrumbs, menu links, etc., will be made relative to project.url. <p/> Links will not be changed if this is set to false, or if the project has no URL defined.

parameter.name: reportPlugins
parameter.description:
Configuration section used internally by Maven 3.

More details available here: http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-site-plugin/maven-3.html#Configuration_formats

Note: using this field is not mandatory with Maven 3 as Maven core injects usual <reporting> section into this field.

parameter.name: reports
parameter.description: Reports (Maven 2).

parameter.name: repositories
parameter.description: Remote repositories used for the project.

parameter.name: siteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the site.xml file and the source for apt, fml and xdoc docs.

parameter.name: template
parameter.description: Default template page.

parameter.name: templateDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the template page.

parameter.name: templateFile
parameter.description: The location of a Velocity template file to use. When used, skins and the default templates, CSS and images are disabled. It is highly recommended that you package this as a skin instead.

parameter.name: xdocDirectory
parameter.deprecated: use the standard m2 directory layout
parameter.description: Alternative directory for xdoc source, useful for m1 to m2 migration

mojo.description:
Generates the site for a single project.

Note that links between module sites in a multi module build will not work, since local build directory structure doesn't match deployed site.

parameter.name: attributes
parameter.description: Additional template properties for rendering the site. See Doxia Site Renderer.

parameter.name: generateProjectInfo
parameter.description: Whether to generate the summary page for project reports: project-info.html.

parameter.name: generateReports
parameter.description: Convenience parameter that allows you to disable report generation.

parameter.name: generateSitemap
parameter.description: Generate a sitemap. The result will be a "sitemap.html" file at the site root.

parameter.name: generatedSiteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing generated documentation. This is used to pick up other source docs that might have been generated at build time.

parameter.name: inputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the input encoding.

parameter.name: localRepository
parameter.description: The local repository.

parameter.name: locales
parameter.description: A comma separated list of locales supported by Maven. The first valid token will be the default Locale for this instance of the Java Virtual Machine.

parameter.name: moduleExcludes
outputDirectory
parameter.description: Directory where the project sites and report distributions will be generated.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the output encoding.

parameter.name: reactorProjects
parameter.description: The reactor projects.

parameter.name: relativizeDecorationLinks
parameter.description: Make links in the site descriptor relative to the project URL. By default, any absolute links that appear in the site descriptor, e.g. banner hrefs, breadcrumbs, menu links, etc., will be made relative to project.url. <p/> Links will not be changed if this is set to false, or if the project has no URL defined.

parameter.name: reportPlugins
parameter.description:
Configuration section used internally by Maven 3.

More details available here: http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-site-plugin/maven-3.html#Configuration_formats

Note: using this field is not mandatory with Maven 3 as Maven core injects usual <reporting> section into this field.

parameter.name: reports
parameter.description: Reports (Maven 2).

parameter.name: repositories
parameter.description: Remote repositories used for the project.

parameter.name: siteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the site.xml file and the source for apt, fml and xdoc docs.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Set this to 'true' to skip site generation and staging.

parameter.name: template
parameter.description: Default template page.

parameter.name: templateDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the template page.

parameter.name: templateFile
parameter.description: The location of a Velocity template file to use. When used, skins and the default templates, CSS and images are disabled. It is highly recommended that you package this as a skin instead.

parameter.name: validate
parameter.description: Whether to validate xml input documents. If set to true, all input documents in xml format (in particular xdoc and fml) will be validated and any error will lead to a build failure.

parameter.name: xdocDirectory
parameter.deprecated: use the standard m2 directory layout
parameter.description: Alternative directory for xdoc source, useful for m1 to m2 migration

mojo.description:
Display help information on maven-site-plugin.
Call mvn site:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.

mojo.description: Bundles the site output into a JAR so that it can be deployed to a repository.

parameter.name: archive
parameter.description: The archive configuration to use. See Maven Archiver Reference.

parameter.name: archiveExcludes
parameter.description: List of files to exclude. Specified as file set patterns which are relative to the input directory whose contents is being packaged into the JAR.

parameter.name: archiveIncludes
parameter.description: List of files to include. Specified as file set patterns which are relative to the input directory whose contents is being packaged into the JAR.

parameter.name: attach
parameter.description: Specifies whether to attach the generated artifact to the project.

parameter.name: attributes
parameter.description: Additional template properties for rendering the site. See Doxia Site Renderer.

parameter.name: finalName
parameter.description: Specifies the filename that will be used for the generated jar file. Please note that "-site" will be appended to the file name.

parameter.name: generateProjectInfo
parameter.description: Whether to generate the summary page for project reports: project-info.html.

parameter.name: generateReports
parameter.description: Convenience parameter that allows you to disable report generation.

parameter.name: generateSitemap
parameter.description: Generate a sitemap. The result will be a "sitemap.html" file at the site root.

parameter.name: generatedSiteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing generated documentation. This is used to pick up other source docs that might have been generated at build time.

parameter.name: inputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the input encoding.

parameter.name: jarOutputDirectory
parameter.description: Specifies the directory where the generated jar file will be put.

parameter.name: localRepository
parameter.description: The local repository.

parameter.name: locales
parameter.description: A comma separated list of locales supported by Maven. The first valid token will be the default Locale for this instance of the Java Virtual Machine.

parameter.name: moduleExcludes
outputDirectory
parameter.description: Directory where the project sites and report distributions will be generated.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the output encoding.

parameter.name: reactorProjects
parameter.description: The reactor projects.

parameter.name: relativizeDecorationLinks
parameter.description: Make links in the site descriptor relative to the project URL. By default, any absolute links that appear in the site descriptor, e.g. banner hrefs, breadcrumbs, menu links, etc., will be made relative to project.url. <p/> Links will not be changed if this is set to false, or if the project has no URL defined.

parameter.name: reportPlugins
parameter.description:
Configuration section used internally by Maven 3.

More details available here: http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-site-plugin/maven-3.html#Configuration_formats

Note: using this field is not mandatory with Maven 3 as Maven core injects usual <reporting> section into this field.

parameter.name: reports
parameter.description: Reports (Maven 2).

parameter.name: repositories
parameter.description: Remote repositories used for the project.

parameter.name: siteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the site.xml file and the source for apt, fml and xdoc docs.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Set this to 'true' to skip site generation and staging.

parameter.name: template
parameter.description: Default template page.

parameter.name: templateDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the template page.

parameter.name: templateFile
parameter.description: The location of a Velocity template file to use. When used, skins and the default templates, CSS and images are disabled. It is highly recommended that you package this as a skin instead.

parameter.name: validate
parameter.description: Whether to validate xml input documents. If set to true, all input documents in xml format (in particular xdoc and fml) will be validated and any error will lead to a build failure.

parameter.name: xdocDirectory
parameter.deprecated: use the standard m2 directory layout
parameter.description: Alternative directory for xdoc source, useful for m1 to m2 migration

mojo.description: Deploys the generated site to a staging or mock URL to the site URL specified in the <distributionManagement> section of the POM, using wagon supported protocols

parameter.name: chmod
parameter.description: Whether to run the "chmod" command on the remote site after the deploy. Defaults to "true".

parameter.name: chmodMode
parameter.description: The mode used by the "chmod" command. Only used if chmod = true. Defaults to "g+w,a+rX".

parameter.name: chmodOptions
parameter.description: The options used by the "chmod" command. Only used if chmod = true. Defaults to "-Rf".

parameter.name: inputDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the generated project sites and report distributions.

parameter.name: inputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the input encoding.

parameter.name: localRepository
parameter.description: The local repository.

parameter.name: locales
parameter.description: A comma separated list of locales supported by Maven. The first valid token will be the default Locale for this instance of the Java Virtual Machine.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the output encoding.

parameter.name: reactorProjects
parameter.description: The reactor projects.

parameter.name: siteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the site.xml file and the source for apt, fml and xdoc docs.

parameter.name: skipDeploy
parameter.description: Set this to 'true' to skip site deployment.

parameter.name: stagingRepositoryId
parameter.description:
The identifier of the repository where the staging site will be deployed. This id will be used to lookup a corresponding <server> entry from the settings.xml. If a matching <server> entry is found, its configured credentials will be used for authentication.

If this is not specified, then the corresponding value of distributionManagement.site.id will be taken as default, unless this is not defined either then the String "stagingSite" is used. (Note: until v. 2.3 and 3.0-beta-3 the String "stagingSite" is always used.)

parameter.name: stagingSiteURL
parameter.description:
The staged site will be deployed to this URL.

If you don't specify this, the default-value will be "${project.distributionManagement.site.url}/staging", where "project" is either the current project or, in a reactor build, the top level project in the reactor.

Note that even if you specify this plugin parameter, you still need to indicate ${project.distributionManagement.site.url} at least in your top level project in order for relative links between modules to be resolved correctly.

parameter.name: topSiteURL
parameter.description: Top distribution management site url, for manual configuration when auto-calculated value doesn't match expectations. Relative module directory will be calculated from this url.

mojo.description:
Deploys the generated site using wagon supported protocols to the site URL specified in the <distributionManagement> section of the POM.

For scp protocol, the website files are packaged by wagon into zip archive, then the archive is transfered to the remote host, next it is un-archived which is much faster than making a file by file copy.

parameter.name: chmod
parameter.description: Whether to run the "chmod" command on the remote site after the deploy. Defaults to "true".

parameter.name: chmodMode
parameter.description: The mode used by the "chmod" command. Only used if chmod = true. Defaults to "g+w,a+rX".

parameter.name: chmodOptions
parameter.description: The options used by the "chmod" command. Only used if chmod = true. Defaults to "-Rf".

parameter.name: inputDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the generated project sites and report distributions.

parameter.name: inputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the input encoding.

parameter.name: localRepository
parameter.description: The local repository.

parameter.name: locales
parameter.description: A comma separated list of locales supported by Maven. The first valid token will be the default Locale for this instance of the Java Virtual Machine.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the output encoding.

parameter.name: reactorProjects
parameter.description: The reactor projects.

parameter.name: siteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the site.xml file and the source for apt, fml and xdoc docs.

parameter.name: skipDeploy
parameter.description: Set this to 'true' to skip site deployment.

mojo.description: Starts the site up, rendering documents as requested for faster editing. It uses Jetty as the web server.

parameter.name: attributes
parameter.description: Additional template properties for rendering the site. See Doxia Site Renderer.

parameter.name: generateProjectInfo
parameter.description: Whether to generate the summary page for project reports: project-info.html.

parameter.name: generatedSiteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing generated documentation. This is used to pick up other source docs that might have been generated at build time.

parameter.name: inputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the input encoding.

parameter.name: localRepository
parameter.description: The local repository.

parameter.name: locales
parameter.description: A comma separated list of locales supported by Maven. The first valid token will be the default Locale for this instance of the Java Virtual Machine.

parameter.name: moduleExcludes
outputEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies the output encoding.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port to execute the HTTP server on.

parameter.name: reactorProjects
parameter.description: The reactor projects.

parameter.name: relativizeDecorationLinks
parameter.description: Make links in the site descriptor relative to the project URL. By default, any absolute links that appear in the site descriptor, e.g. banner hrefs, breadcrumbs, menu links, etc., will be made relative to project.url. <p/> Links will not be changed if this is set to false, or if the project has no URL defined.

parameter.name: reportPlugins
parameter.description:
Configuration section used internally by Maven 3.

More details available here: http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-site-plugin/maven-3.html#Configuration_formats

Note: using this field is not mandatory with Maven 3 as Maven core injects usual <reporting> section into this field.

parameter.name: reports
parameter.description: Reports (Maven 2).

parameter.name: repositories
parameter.description: Remote repositories used for the project.

parameter.name: siteDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the site.xml file and the source for apt, fml and xdoc docs.

parameter.name: tempWebappDirectory
parameter.description: Where to create the dummy web application.

parameter.name: template
parameter.description: Default template page.

parameter.name: templateDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing the template page.

parameter.name: templateFile
parameter.description: The location of a Velocity template file to use. When used, skins and the default templates, CSS and images are disabled. It is highly recommended that you package this as a skin instead.

parameter.name: xdocDirectory
parameter.deprecated: use the standard m2 directory layout
parameter.description: Alternative directory for xdoc source, useful for m1 to m2 migration
